attributes.action: Ensure that Portsmouth Football Club pay their full and out standing tax bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that is a disgrace that portsmouth football club should be able to evade a tax bill of £12000000, as hard working tax payers we feel that portsmouth football club should either pay up or be wound up.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Portsmouth Football Club and its administrators.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
